name: Beat 'em Riddles
description:
If you like extremely juicy games that you can play with a friend or not,  this is PERFECT! for you,  TRUST ME! Better enjoyed with 2 players(one beating monsters, one solving riddles), but still playable if you have no friends :P.

Fight your way through different types of monsters, in this awesome but brutal beat 'em up, and solve 512 different possible combinations of pseudo-random logical riddles, to uncover a SHOCKING!! ending.

Story: You don't know where you are,  you don't know who you are,  you just know you are... or are you? Controls:
  • W, A, S, D for movement
  • Arrow keys for shooting
  • Space for jumping(When you are in the air, you are invincible)
  • Right CTRL to activate ULTRA attack, Arrow keys to direct the ultra attack(The rainbow bar in the right of the screen is the amount of ULTRA charged, it charges with each hit of enemies, and it charges more with enemy kills)
Thanks For Playing, Enjoy :)
